materials.raw_text:
Lead (Pb): 225 g 
 Scandium (Sc): 150 g

sourcing.instructions:

 Scandium: Obtain from specialty chemical suppliers or online platforms such as Sigma-Aldrich. 
 Terbium: Available through rare earth metal suppliers or chemical suppliers online.

preparation.raw_text:
